scripts.rbac-export-tst: npm run build && node build/index.js rbac export --subscription a4e4dec3-7c4e-487a-b0e2-a4c32fad8e17 --pathOut ./temp/rbac-export
scripts.rbac-verify-tst: npm run build && node build/index.js rbac verify --subscription a4e4dec3-7c4e-487a-b0e2-a4c32fad8e17 --pathIn ./temp/rbac-export-a4e4dec3-7c4e-487a-b0e2-a4c32fad8e17.min.json --pathOut ./temp/rbac-verify
scripts.rbac-extend-tst: npm run build && node build/index.js rbac extend --subscription a4e4dec3-7c4e-487a-b0e2-a4c32fad8e17 --pathIn ./temp/rbac-export-a4e4dec3-7c4e-487a-b0e2-a4c32fad8e17.min.json --pathOut ./temp/rbac-extend
